enum.note2: CSC didn't collect all the data points; CAN communication is lost; the maximum, minimum and average voltages sent by
enum.note3: CSC exist invalid number; the detailed voltage exists invalid number

enum.note2: The rack average temperature – system minimum temperature ≤ 1℃
The rack is in HV online status
enum.note4: The rack current |I| <30A and duration T = 15min

enum.note2: Any of the cell temperature sampling is invalid
Rack isolate switch dry contact open
Unclosed main positive contactor feedback contactor
Unclosed negative and positive contactor feedback contactor stick
Unclosed main positive and negative contactor feedback contactors stick
After sending close command for main positive contactor, feedback loop shows contactor still open
After sending close command for main negative contactor, feedback loop shows contactor still open
Battery rack door (travel switch) dry contact open
Main control box fan dry contact open
Rack humidifier fault dry contact close
Rack humidifier fault dry contact open
SBMU lost any TMS CCAN data
SBMU lost any TMS CCAN data
Rack internal voltage < 100V before contactor closing
enum.note4: The total current is greater than (number of high-voltage lines * 30A)
enum.note6: The current of a single Rack is less than 10A

enum.note2: No level 3 fault warning on all TMSs
Pre-charge twice at a time. Pre-charging contactor voltage > 10V after closing
HV+ and HV- reversed connection fault
